org.apache.hadoop.fs.s3a.s3guard

Class DirListingMetadata

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.fs.s3a.s3guard.DirListingMetadata

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
 @InterfaceStability.Evolving
public class DirListingMetadata
extends Object
    DirListingMetadata models a directory listing stored in a MetadataStore. Instances of this class are mutable and thread-safe.

    • Field Summary

    • Field Detail

      • EMPTY_DIR

        public static final Collection<PathMetadata> EMPTY_DIR
        Convenience parameter for passing into constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DirListingMetadata

        public DirListingMetadata(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path path,
                          Collection<PathMetadata> listing,
                          boolean isAuthoritative)
        Create a directory listing metadata container.
        Parameters:
        path - Path of the directory. If this path has a host component, then all paths added later via put(FileStatus) must also have the same host.
        listing - Entries in the directory.
        isAuthoritative - true iff listing is the full contents of the directory, and the calling client reports that this may be cached as the full and authoritative listing of all files in the directory.

      • DirListingMetadata

        public DirListingMetadata(DirListingMetadata d)
        Copy constructor.
        Parameters:
        d - the existing DirListingMetadata object.

    • Method Detail

      • getPath

        public org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path getPath()
        Returns:
        Path of the directory that contains this listing.

      • getListing

        public Collection<PathMetadata> getListing()
        Returns:
        entries in the directory

      • listTombstones

        public Set<org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path> listTombstones()

      • withoutTombstones

        public DirListingMetadata withoutTombstones()

      • numEntries

        public int numEntries()
        Returns:
        number of entries tracked. This is not the same as the number of entries in the actual directory unless isAuthoritative() is true.

      • isAuthoritative

        public boolean isAuthoritative()
        Returns:
        true iff this directory listing is full and authoritative within the scope of the MetadataStore that returned it.

      • isEmpty

        public Tristate isEmpty()
        Is the underlying directory known to be empty?
        Returns:
        FALSE if directory is known to have a child entry, TRUE if directory is known to be empty, UNKNOWN otherwise.

      • setAuthoritative

        public void setAuthoritative(boolean authoritative)
        Marks this directory listing as full and authoritative.
        Parameters:
        authoritative - see isAuthoritative().

      • get

        public PathMetadata get(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path childPath)
        Lookup entry within this directory listing. This may return null if the MetadataStore only tracks a partial set of the directory entries. In the case where isAuthoritative() is true, however, this function returns null iff the directory is known not to contain the listing at given path (within the scope of the MetadataStore that returned it).
        Parameters:
        childPath - path of entry to look for.
        Returns:
        entry, or null if it is not present or not being tracked.

      • markDeleted

        public void markDeleted(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path childPath)
        Replace an entry with a tombstone.
        Parameters:
        childPath - path of entry to replace.

      • remove

        public void remove(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path childPath)
        Remove entry from this directory.
        Parameters:
        childPath - path of entry to remove.

      • put

        public boolean put(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileStatus childFileStatus)
        Add an entry to the directory listing. If this listing already contains a FileStatus with the same path, it will be replaced.
        Parameters:
        childFileStatus - entry to add to this directory listing.
        Returns:
        true if the status was added or replaced with a new value. False if the same FileStatus value was already present.

        public String toString()
        Overrides:

        Parameters:
